title: Analysts warn of $1.5M phishing exploit tied to Ethereum’s new EIP-7702
body: Analysts have sounded the alarm about a vulnerability linked to the relatively new Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP-7702) feature following a phishing attack that cost one investor over a million. Anti-fraud service Scam Sniffer has noted an increase in phishing scams where attackers target addresses upgraded under the new EIP-7702 standard. The EIP-7702 feature, which was introduced as part of the Pectra upgrade from May, is designed to enhance wallet functionality by allowing Externally Owned Accounts (EOAs) to temporarily behave like smart contracts. This feature encourages optimization by allowing multiple operations to be executed within a single transaction, thereby improving efficiency for legitimate users. However, the feature has reportedly opened them up to new exploitation windows. There have been at least three victims this month The latest unfortunate victim reportedly lost a total of $1.54 million after signing EIP-7702 phishing batch transactions that contained multiple token transfers and NFT approval operations. Part of those funds has reportedly been bridged to Mainnet via Relay Protocol. Exploiters bridged the stolen funds to Mainnet via Relay Protocol. Sourcce: @realScamSniffer (X/Twitter) The case comes two days after Scam Sniffer announced that another investor had lost $1M in tokens and NFTs after signing phishing batch transactions disguised as Uniswap swaps. That exploit came weeks after the anti-fraud service reported that an EIP-7702 upgraded address lost $66k to the same group using the same exploit. These schemes involve a fraudulent DeFi interface that is typically designed to mimic platforms like Uniswap. The victims were prompted to approve transactions that at first glance appeared routine, but in reality, were authorized hidden transfers. Upon approval, attackers would drain the wallet almost instantly, siphoning crypto and NFTs. According to Scam Sniffer, many users are still in the dark about the risks linked to EIP-7702 because it is a recent development. Since the malicious transactions are usually structured to appear normal, unsuspecting users are vulnerable. Security experts have reported EIP-7702 exploits since June Scam Sniffer has confirmed that phishing attacks targeting EIP-7702 upgraded addresses have gone up, indicating a growing trend. However, it is not a new trend, as security experts have been reporting incidents for months now. In June, Wintermute researchers revealed exploiters have targeted several unsuspecting crypto wallets with “automated sweeper” attacks, this time, using “delegate contracts”– a new feature launched as part of the EIP 7702. While EIP-7702 brings new convenience, it also introduces new risks Our Research team found that over 97% of all EIP-7702 delegations were authorized to multiple contracts using the same exact code. These are sweepers, used to automatically drain incoming ETH from compromised… pic.twitter.com/xHp7zr4hC9 — Wintermute (@wintermute_t) May 30, 2025 In a series of tweets shared via its official X handle, Wintermute claimed its research team had discovered that over 80% of all EIP-7702 delegations were authorized to multiple contracts using the same exact code. They called them sweepers and reported that they are used to automatically drain incoming ETH from compromised addresses. The malicious attempts by hackers to drain ETH from wallets have continued despite the Ethereum Foundation’s one trillion dollar security program, which it announced on May 14. To be safe, Scam Sniffer has urged users to be cautious and vigilant when approving batch transactions and to verify interfaces carefully before signing anything. Fake DeFi platforms designed to mimic legitimate ones have been tagged as one of the most common attack vectors in the crypto sector, and the introduction of batch transactions, though proven to improve user experience for legitimate applications, has added complexity while increasing the chance of an exploit. The best way to get ahead of the issue is to use only trusted applications and triple-check permissions granted during every transaction, batched or not. If you're reading this, you’re already ahead. Stay there with our newsletter .

title: Market Strategist Says XRP Price Discovery Is Next. Here’s why
body: Steph Is Crypto (@Steph_iscrypto), a prominent crypto analyst on X, recently shared a monthly chart suggesting a massive rally. The chart spans more than a decade of price history, distinguishing between where XRP has traded heavily and where the market has moved quickly with little volume. Analyzing the Chart On the chart, heavier volume appears across the bands where XRP spent years consolidating, while the region above the current price shows little historical activity. In the chart, Steph marked the upper portion as “Last Resistance.” Several horizontal levels are drawn below the current price. These appear to represent zones that in the past acted as resistance and now function as support. Despite some minor volatility , recent monthly candles are holding above these levels, signaling that the breakout has pushed XRP out of its long-standing range. #XRP PRICE DISCOVERY IS NEXT! pic.twitter.com/a2SYXCmAv4 — STEPH IS CRYPTO (@Steph_iscrypto) August 23, 2025 When an asset clears the bulk of its historical resistance on a high timeframe, there are few points of reference until new ones form. The chart suggests that XRP is now in that situation, with Steph predicting a new phase of price discovery for the digital asset. Where Is XRP Going Next? The chart does not contain a specific target level. However, the scale of the vertical axis provides a practical reference. The $5 mark is the next round figure clearly visible on the chart, and it sits above the digital asset’s recent peak of $3.65 , which now serves as the highest resistance level. A move to that level would represent an increase of about 63.9% from the cryptocurrency’s price of $3.05. This target illustrates the type of increase that price discovery often implies, and the openness of Steph’s analysis suggests the asset could climb much higher. What Would Validate the Message For the breakout to remain intact, monthly closes should hold above the horizontal bands that were drawn beneath the current price. These levels now serve as the base of support, and leave considerable room for further movement if XRP can surpass the resistance levels. However, if the price falls back below them, the asset might lose momentum and retest lower levels. Other analysts have highlighted $3.65 as a crucial level to overcome before a rapid ascent, and Steph’s analysis reinforces the idea of a clear upward path once the digital asset can surpass this resistance level. The post Market Strategist Says XRP Price Discovery Is Next. Here’s why appeared first on Times Tabloid .

title: OKX Unveils $100 Million X Layer Ecosystem Fund: Details
body: Cryptocurrency exchange OKX is launching a $100 million X Layer, all part of its plan to establish its position in the crypto industry. Star Xu, the exchange’s CEO, announced the news on X, insinuating that OKX has a better understanding of how the crypto market operates. $100 Ecosystem Fund For Builders on OKX’s X Layer Xu started his post by stating that “true builders know crypto is a marathon, not a sprint.” He further noted that both OKX and X Layer were designed for the long run and on this premise, they are launching a $100 million Ecosystem Fund. This initiative is to provide support to global builders, particularly those busy shaping the next wave of onchain applications. There is an open call for builders who have a long-term vision and are focused on real technology. “But if your goal is just a quick pump-and-dump token, we’re not the place for you,” the OKX CEO explained on X. OKX and Polygon Team Up For X Layer More than a year ago, OKX and Ethereum-based layer-2 protocol Polygon teamed up to officially release the former’s X Layer engine on the mainnet. The goal of the X Layer network is to improve speed and make Ethereum transactions more affordable for its users. Through this network, users were promised easy interaction with Decentralized Applications (dApps). They can also trade digital assets and participate in various blockchain activities. The X Layer is built using the Polygon Chain Development Kit (CDK) and uses Zero Knowledge (ZK) for security. Haider Rafique, the Chief Marketing Officer of OKX, also commented. He noted that the network is designed for forward-thinking creators who are developing applications to onboard millions of people onto the blockchain. OKX Brings Major Upgrade to its X Layer It is worth noting that this announcement about the $100 million fund comes almost two weeks after OKX talked about its major upgrade to its X Layer network. This means that it is transitioning into a public blockchain optimized for payments and Decentralized Finance (DeFi). This overhaul involves the optimization of the economic model of its OKB Gas Token. This means that OKX will upgrade the OKB smart contract to remove functions for additional issuance and manual burning. By carrying putting action, the total OKB supply will be permanently fixed at 21 million tokens. In parallel, OKX will also fade out the OKTChain, with OKT trading scheduled to end at 14:10 (UTC+8) on August 13, 2025. The post OKX Unveils $100 Million X Layer Ecosystem Fund: Details appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: The Pioneering Meme Coin 2025: Inside XYZVerse's (XYZ) Community Explosion and Presale Achievement
body: The meme coin market never sleeps, and each cycle seems to crown a new community favorite. In 2025, all eyes are turning toward XYZVerse (XYZ)—a project that blends sports passion with crypto culture and has already sparked strong buzz among retail investors. With its presale raising millions and token prices climbing through multiple stages, XYZVerse is emerging as more than just another short-lived meme play. Instead, it’s building momentum through a dedicated fan-driven ecosystem, promising both cultural relevance and potential financial upside. But what exactly is fueling this surge, and why are so many early adopters betting on XYZVerse’s surge? Why is XYZVerse.io a must-watch token of the year? Let’s dive in and find out. Understanding XYZVerse – the first all-sports meme token Coin name XYZVerse ($XYZ) Contract Address 0xD75Ab4b69F2eDfb072fDFD7e2D15a875f95Ae5ae Funds Raised $15M+ Launch Date Q4 2025 (Listing target: $0.10) Current Price Performance 5,300% (from $0.0001 to current stage price of $0.0054) Community 21K+ X followers, 12K+ Telegram followers Contract Safety Audited by Pessimistic Audit and SolidProof XYZVerse is a meme coin project built on the idea of sports betting, gamified staking, and crypto. It carves out a unique niche as the first all-sports meme coin, a concept that naturally connects with a wide audience of sports fans. XYZ aims to add real-world utility for sports lovers through crypto. One major step forward is its partnership with bookmaker.XYZ , a decentralized sportsbook and casino. Thanks to this, $XYZ holders enjoy exclusive betting perks, rewards, and access to play-to-earn experiences. XYZVerse is building a full-featured ecosystem that will eventually include Telegram-based mini games, airdrop events, and upcoming dApps focused on staking, rewards, and deeper community engagement. How XYZVerse Has Redefined Presale and Reached $15M+ XYZVerse launched its presale with a structure aimed at rewarding early adopters and maintaining long-term growth. Initially, the token price increased with each new stage, and that’s how $XYZ grew from just $0.0001 in Stage 1 to $0.0054 today, marking a remarkable gain of over 5,000%. Recently, the team upgraded this model to make the process more dynamic. Instead of fixed stages, the price now climbs with every $100,000 raised. This change eliminates delays between stages and adds a real sense of urgency, as every purchase moves the price up. The presale will continue under this structure until the target cap of $30 million is reached, pushing momentum and incentivizing faster participation. As of today, $XYZ has already raised over $15 million, reflecting community confidence in the token. To further boost engagement and trust, XYZVerse has launched a dedicated Telegram channel where users can track live updates on the presale progress. Every new contribution is logged and visible to the community, thus creating a transparent, fast-paced environment where buyers can actually see the total raised amount grow almost in real time. Every second you wait, someone else is buying. Get $XYZ while the presale is live How Secure and Reliable Is XYZVerse? Though XYZVerse is still in its presale phase, it’s already showing strong signs of legitimacy and thoughtful planning. Of course, as with any crypto project, the real test will come after launch when real-world utility and market traction can speak for themselves. But there are already some solid reasons to trust what’s being built. Independent Audit by a Leading Security Firm XYZVerse’s smart contract has undergone a full audit by Pessimistic , a highly regarded name in blockchain security. The results were reassuring: the contract was found to be secure, gas-efficient, and free from critical or high-risk vulnerabilities. The audit report is available to the public, showing a level of transparency rarely seen among meme coin projects. In a space flooded with unaudited, hastily assembled tokens, this gives XYZVerse a major credibility boost. Deflationary Tokenomics and Long-Term Supply Control With a fixed supply of 100 billion tokens, XYZVerse incorporates scarcity into its design. But it doesn’t stop there—through an ongoing burn mechanism, tokens are gradually removed from circulation using buybacks. This approach helps reduce inflationary pressure and rewards those who hold for the long term, reinforcing a value-focused rather than hype-only model. A Deeper Look Into XYZVerse Tokenomics Structure XYZ tokenomics reveal a project’s economic structure and are a crucial factor in evaluating its long-term sustainability. XYZVerse adopts a clear and balanced tokenomics model , with a fixed total supply of 100 billion tokens, ensuring the project is non-inflationary and scarcity-driven by design. Total Supply: 100,000,000,000 A combined 30% is allocated to marketing and liquidity—15% each—ensuring early visibility and a seamless launch across centralized and decentralized exchanges. This provides the foundation for broad exposure and trading accessibility. One of the standout features is the 17.13% burn allocation, making XYZVerse one of the few meme coins to integrate a significant deflationary mechanism from day one. This design reduces overall supply over time, increasing scarcity and rewarding long-term holders. To sustain innovation and product development, 10% of the total supply is reserved for ecosystem growth and ongoing development. An additional 10% is allocated for airdrops, rewards, and community incentives, which encourages active participation and decentralized engagement. Unlike many meme projects that over-allocate to internal teams, XYZVerse takes a more disciplined approach with just 10% allocated to the team, aligning with industry best practices and promoting transparency. Most importantly, over 40% of the supply is directed toward community-focused distributions—including presale, key opinion leaders (KOLs), and airdrops—underscoring the project’s grassroots-first philosophy. If executed with consistency and transparency, this allocation model not only builds trust but also provides the necessary infrastructure for XYZVerse to maintain relevance and competitiveness well beyond its initial launch. What Does Community Say? Community sentiment around XYZVerse is overwhelmingly positive, signaling strong confidence in the project’s vision and trajectory. On CoinMarketCap , more than 96% of users have given $XYZ a bullish rating, placing it among the top-ranked meme coins by community approval. This optimism is echoed across the project’s social channels: 21K+ followers on X (formerly Twitter) 12K+ active Telegram members XYZVerse is already building the kind of community most early-stage crypto projects can only dream of. On platforms like X (formerly Twitter), users are actively discussing the project, sharing their excitement, and showing clear confidence in its potential. Many are calling it a “solid project” with real use cases, while others are pointing to the growing number of daily buyers and active presale momentum. The tone is overwhelmingly bullish, with plenty of users going “all in” or expressing that they’re “hyped” for what’s ahead. This kind of organic support speaks volumes. It shows that XYZVerse isn’t just gaining attention—it’s earning trust. When a project generates this much energy before even launching on exchanges, it’s often a strong signal of what’s to come. With community energy continuing to rise and broader market sentiment improving, XYZVerse is shaping up to be one of the most promising meme coin contenders of the next cycle. The community is building fast. If you’re still on the sidelines, this may be your signal to jump in. What’s Ahead for XYZVerse? The outlook for XYZVerse appears increasingly promising as the project cements its position at the intersection of meme culture, gamified crypto experiences, and mainstream sports engagement. Backed by a strong roadmap and early presale momentum, XYZVerse is preparing for a major launch across both centralized and decentralized exchanges. This expansion will not only improve liquidity and visibility but also introduce $XYZ to a broader investor audience beyond presale participants. Several strategic developments are lined up to drive long-term growth: The rollout of staking and reward-based dApps will give holders new ways to earn passively while interacting with the platform. Telegram-based play-to-earn games will evolve, turning everyday engagement into real crypto rewards. Collaborations with influencers and athletes will help bridge the gap between Web3 and traditional sports fans. A robust marketing and sponsorship push is set to extend the brand’s reach well beyond the crypto-native space. Token burns and liquidity initiatives will help sustain price performance and reduce circulating supply. If the roadmap stays on track, XYZVerse has the potential to evolve from a breakout meme coin into a full-fledged Web3 entertainment hub with staying power beyond the next hype cycle. Final Verdict If XYZVerse continues to execute according to its roadmap and maintain its fast-growing community momentum, it has the potential to evolve from a speculative meme coin into one of the breakout crossover stories of the 2025 bull run. Its mix of real-world utility, sports integration, and strong tokenomics positions it well for sustained relevance in the Web3 space. title: Hut 8 doubles equity program to $1B as it pivots from Bitcoin mining to AI megaprojects
body: Hut 8, a Bitcoin miner and data center operator, has doubled the size of its at-the-market equity program, giving itself the option to raise as much as $1 billion in fresh capital. The new funding authorization, revealed in a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday, replaces the $500 million program Hut 8 launched late last year. That earlier program had already brought in nearly $300 million before the company pulled the plug. AI megaproject in Louisiana Last week, Hut 8 broke ground on what could become one of the most ambitious AI data center projects in the country: a $2.5 billion campus in West Feliciana Parish, Louisiana. Set across 611 acres near Entergy’s River Bend substation, the project will eventually feature two 450,000-square-foot buildings packed with computing hardware. The first is expected to be ready by the end of 2025, with the second following within two years. Officials say thousands of construction jobs will be created in the short term, with dozens of high-skilled, long-term roles once the facility is operational. A pivot beyond the mining grind Bitcoin miners have been squeezed by rising network difficulty, volatile BTC prices, and tighter energy markets. Margins are thinner, competition is tougher, and relying solely on mining has become a risky strategy. Hut 8 has responded with a pivot. The company recently went through a corporate rebranding and branded itself as a “power-first, platform-driven business,” a signal that it wants to be seen as more than just a bitcoin miner. Alongside mining, it has been investing heavily in hosting operations, high-density compute, and GPU-as-a-service offerings. In practice, that means Hut 8 is straddling two fast-moving markets: crypto and AI. The $1 billion ATM facility gives the company flexibility to scale on both fronts. It’s a financial cushion that could help fund new ASIC deployments while also financing massive data center projects like Louisiana. What’s at stake for Hut 8? For Hut 8, this is about more than hedging against Bitcoin’s cycles . It’s a long-term bet that AI demand will remain sky-high, and that enterprises will continue paying top dollar for reliable computing power at scale. If Hut 8 delivers on schedule, the Louisiana campus could turn it into a major player in AI infrastructure, alongside its established Bitcoin mining business. With a fresh $1 billion fundraising capacity and one of the largest AI-focused data center projects in the U.S. underway, Hut 8 is making its intentions clear: it wants to be a leader not only in Bitcoin mining but in the world of compute power as well. title: Top 10 Crypto PR Agencies [2025 Ranking with Case Studies]
body: In a space as volatile as crypto, public relations is more than hype—it’s survival. The right PR partner can get your project seen in tier-one outlets, build investor confidence, and keep you credible through bull and bear cycles. This 2025 ranking reviews the 10 best crypto PR agencies, highlights their specialties, and shares case studies of how they’ve delivered results. Why Crypto PR Matters More Than Ever in 2025 Noise levels are higher than ever: Thousands of tokens launch monthly. Standing out requires smart narrative strategy. Reputation equals valuation: With regulatory oversight increasing, trust and credibility weigh as much as community hype. Media is selective: Outlets like CoinTelegraph or Decrypt want real stories, not generic press releases. Momentum is fragile: Missing a timely PR push during market cycles can mean losing traction permanently. That’s why the agencies listed below don’t just push news—they translate complex Web3 products into stories investors, media, and users actually engage with. How to Pick the Right PR Partner Match your milestone: Fundraising, token launch, exchange listing, or community growth all demand different strengths. Ask for case studies: Agencies should prove results in your niche, not just show a client logo wall. Define metrics upfront: Whether it’s backlinks, referral traffic, or investor meetings, PR should be tracked, not guessed. Test adaptability: Markets move fast—your PR team should pivot messaging when sentiment shifts. Top Crypto PR Agencies 2025 Agency Strengths Best Fit For Coinbound Media + influencer scale NFT, gaming, exchanges Outset PR ROI-tracked campaigns DeFi, AI, token projects needing trust MarketAcross Enterprise global coverage VC-backed, late-stage projects NinjaPromo PR + full-funnel marketing Early-stage crypto/fintech SaaS Crowdcreate Investor + KOL outreach Teams raising capital FINPR Guaranteed placements Presales, NFT drops Lunar Strategy Ecosystem + community growth Mid-tier Web3 projects CoinScribble Fast PR distribution Urgent announcements Melrose PR Thought leadership positioning Executives, founders Blockchain PR Legacy media credibility Projects valuing veteran stability Outset PR Delivers Tangible Results That Build Trust Among newer boutique agencies, Outset PR has carved out a reputation for delivering clarity and measurable outcomes in a sector where results are often vague. Rather than flooding newswires with generic announcements, this agency emphasizes strategic placement tied to media performance and the current market narrative. Case Study: DeFi and AI clients reported not only tier-one placements but also traceable results: organic traffic spikes, new exchange conversations, and stronger share of voice against competitors. Strengths: Data-backed campaigns, editorial discipline, and senior-level involvement on every account. Specialization: Blockchain, DeFi, and AI startups where credibility and positioning matter as much as visibility. What Sets Them Apart: A performance-first philosophy—every campaign is judged on its impact, not just coverage volume. Best For: Founders who want proof that PR spend delivers real results, especially in markets where trust is fragile. 2. Coinbound — Media Firepower + Influencer Networks Case Study: Helped Immutable X and Gala Games secure global media placements alongside major creator campaigns. Strengths: Top-tier crypto and mainstream coverage (CoinDesk, TechCrunch, Blockworks) plus one of the largest crypto influencer rosters. Best For: Exchanges, NFT platforms, and gaming projects seeking fast visibility across media and social channels. 3. MarketAcross — Enterprise-Grade PR Engine Case Study: Supported Binance and Avalanche with global media campaigns, ensuring coverage across top crypto outlets and international mainstream channels. Strengths: Large-scale execution, enterprise-level account management. Best For: VC-backed or late-stage crypto companies seeking global scale and consistency. 4. NinjaPromo — Integrated PR + Full-Funnel Marketing Case Study: Helped fintech/crypto SaaS firms run simultaneous PR and performance marketing campaigns, blending storytelling with conversions. Strengths: PR combined with branding, creative, paid ads, and social. Best For: Early-stage launches needing PR + digital marketing under one roof. 5. Crowdcreate — Investor + KOL Outreach Case Study: Built campaigns targeting investors and VCs for token presales, while activating 800+ Web3 influencers to create community traction. Strengths: Investor introductions, influencer campaigns, and advisory. Best For: Projects raising capital or courting investors while needing community credibility. 6. FINPR — Guaranteed Media Placements Case Study: Delivered 300+ guaranteed media pickups for NFT campaigns, ensuring wide exposure during launch phases. Strengths: Speed, scale, and guaranteed coverage. Best For: Teams needing assured visibility fast (token launches, presales, NFT drops). 7. Lunar Strategy — Ecosystem-Focused Growth Case Study: Supported mid-tier DeFi protocols with community-oriented PR campaigns, connecting growth strategy to ecosystem expansion. Strengths: Web3 and NFT native; community-first. Best For: Teams building ecosystems that need long-term visibility and community building. 8. CoinScribble — Distribution at Speed Case Study: Syndicated time-sensitive announcements within hours across hundreds of crypto media outlets. Strengths: Fast, reliable PR distribution with guaranteed pickups. Best For: Projects with urgent news cycles requiring immediate visibility. 9. Melrose PR — Thought Leadership in Web3 Case Study: Elevated blockchain executives into industry voices through consistent op-eds, conference coverage, and media commentary. Strengths: Thought leadership, brand positioning, industry reputation building. Best For: Founders who want to become faces of credibility in Web3. 10. Blockchain PR — Pioneer Agency with Staying Power Case Study: Supported early blockchain projects, leveraging legacy experience and credibility with journalists. Strengths: Longstanding media relationships and institutional knowledge. Best For: Projects that value experience, stability, and veteran guidance. Final Take Crypto PR in 2025 is about narratives that survive cycles. From Coinbound’s influencer scale to Outset PR’s measurable approach and MarketAcross’s enterprise reach, the best agencies don’t just tell your story—they place it in the right context at the right time. If you’re serious about visibility, credibility, and long-term growth, these ten agencies are the ones worth putting on your shortlist. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) 1. What makes a crypto PR agency different from a traditional PR firm?Crypto PR agencies specialize in blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, and Web3. They understand token launches, exchange listings, regulatory sensitivities, and the fast-moving nature of the market. Traditional agencies may excel in consumer or corporate PR, but often lack the industry-specific media relationships and investor/community connections crypto projects need. 2. How do I know if a PR agency is delivering real results?Look beyond vanity metrics like the number of press releases. Real results include: Backlinks and SEO impact Referral traffic from media placements Share of voice against competitors Investor outreach or meeting requests generated from campaigns. Agencies like Outset PR stand out for explicitly tracking these performance metrics. 3. Do I need PR during a bear market? Yes. In fact, bear markets are when PR matters most. Visibility and credibility built during downturns position projects to accelerate when sentiment improves. Agencies with adaptive strategies—such as Coinbound’s influencer flexibility or Outset PR’s context-aware storytelling—help brands maintain relevance even in quieter cycles. 4. How quickly can I expect results from a crypto PR campaign?Press release distribution can take 24–48 hours, while earned media placements may take weeks of pitching. Building long-term credibility (like thought leadership) takes months. Agencies that track KPIs transparently make it easier to measure short-term wins alongside long-term gains. title: Bitcoin’s Price Surge: BTC Astonishingly Rises Above $113,000
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin’s Price Surge: BTC Astonishingly Rises Above $113,000 The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with excitement! According to recent Bitcoin World market monitoring, a truly significant event has unfolded: Bitcoin’s Price Surge has pushed BTC astonishingly above the $113,000 mark. This is not just a number; it represents a powerful moment for the digital asset market, capturing the attention of both seasoned investors and curious newcomers alike. What’s Driving This Phenomenal Bitcoin’s Price Surge? Many factors contribute to such a dramatic upward movement in the market. Understanding these elements is crucial for anyone following cryptocurrency trends. This particular Bitcoin’s Price Surge reflects a confluence of various influences. Increased Institutional Adoption: More large financial institutions are showing interest in Bitcoin, viewing it as a legitimate asset class. This influx of institutional capital provides significant buying pressure. Macroeconomic Conditions: Global economic uncertainties often drive investors towards alternative assets like Bitcoin, which some consider a digital safe haven. Halving Event Narrative: While not recent, the impact of previous Bitcoin halving events often fuels long-term bullish sentiment, creating anticipation for future scarcity and value. These elements combine to create a robust environment, encouraging investors to engage with Bitcoin. Moreover, the increasing mainstream acceptance further solidifies its position. The Immediate Impact of BTC Crossing $113,000 When BTC crosses such a significant threshold, the immediate market reaction is palpable. Bitcoin is currently trading at an impressive $113,033.86 on the Binance USDT market, a widely recognized platform for cryptocurrency trading. This specific price point is a strong indicator of current market confidence. This upward movement typically triggers several effects: Investor Confidence Boost: A new all-time high or a significant price milestone often instills greater confidence among holders, potentially reducing selling pressure. Increased Trading Volume: Higher prices usually attract more traders, leading to increased liquidity and market activity. Positive Media Coverage: Such a notable Bitcoin’s Price Surge garners widespread media attention, introducing more people to the cryptocurrency space. This positive feedback loop can further accelerate momentum, creating a dynamic and exciting trading environment for BTC. Navigating the Volatility: Opportunities and Challenges While a Bitcoin’s Price Surge presents exciting opportunities, it also comes with inherent challenges due to the volatile nature of the crypto market. It is important for every investor to approach these movements with a balanced perspective. Potential Benefits: Capital Appreciation: For those holding Bitcoin, a price increase means a direct rise in the value of their assets. Market Validation: Breaking new price barriers reinforces Bitcoin’s legitimacy and long-term potential as a store of value. Challenges to Consider: Market Volatility: Prices can fluctuate rapidly, and a surge can be followed by a correction. Risk Management: Investors must be mindful of their risk tolerance and not invest more than they can afford to lose. Actionable Insights: Always conduct thorough research before making investment decisions. Consider strategies like Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) to mitigate risks over time. What Does This Bitcoin’s Price Surge Mean for the Future? The recent rally of BTC above $113,000 undoubtedly marks a pivotal moment. Many experts are now pondering what this incredible Bitcoin’s Price Surge signifies for the broader cryptocurrency landscape and its future trajectory. While predicting exact future prices is impossible, this milestone suggests a strengthening foundation for Bitcoin. The consistent breaking of new price barriers indicates growing adoption and a maturing market. However, it also reminds us of the importance of staying informed and adaptable. The journey of Bitcoin has always been dynamic, and its continued evolution promises to be just as captivating. In conclusion, Bitcoin’s impressive rise above $113,000 is a testament to its enduring appeal and growing influence in the global financial arena. This significant Bitcoin’s Price Surge , observed through market monitoring, highlights the digital asset’s resilience and the increasing confidence of investors worldwide. As BTC continues its journey, staying informed and understanding market dynamics remains paramount for navigating this exciting landscape effectively. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is driving Bitcoin’s current price surge? A1: Several factors contribute, including increased institutional investment, global macroeconomic conditions pushing investors towards alternative assets, and the lingering positive sentiment from past halving events which suggest future scarcity. Q2: Is $113,000 an all-time high for Bitcoin? A2: While $113,000 is a significant milestone, Bitcoin’s actual all-time high has varied. This specific price point represents a substantial rally and a key psychological level for the market at the time of reporting. Q3: What platform reported Bitcoin trading at $113,033.86? A3: According to Bitcoin World market monitoring, BTC was trading at $113,033.86 on the Binance USDT market, a leading global cryptocurrency exchange. Q4: Should I invest in Bitcoin now that its price has surged? A4: Investing in Bitcoin carries risks due to its volatility. It is crucial to conduct your own thorough research, understand your risk tolerance, and consider consulting with a financial advisor before making any investment decisions. Q5: How does this Bitcoin’s Price Surge impact the broader crypto market? A5: A significant Bitcoin’s Price Surge often has a positive ripple effect across the entire cryptocurrency market, boosting investor confidence and potentially leading to rallies in altcoins as well. title: Trump launches new crypto venture, takes profit early, leaving supporters broke
body: Donald Trump, from inside the White House, has pushed a new crypto investment. This time, it’s dressed up as a “crypto treasury” firm. But just like the last two times, his base is paying the price. The setup is simple: Trump cashes out early. Everyone else eats the loss. According to The Wall Street Journal , the strategy looks eerily familiar to anyone who’s watched his past financial ventures blow up in supporters’ faces. The playbook hasn’t changed. Trump burns backers again with Truth Social collapse When Trump dropped his Truth Social platform through Trump Media & Technology Group, fans jumped in. But those who didn’t get in before it changed its ticker to DJT got crushed. That stock is now down 52% from right before the merger. From the high it reached a week later, it’s dropped 73%. Not learning the lesson, many went straight into $TRUMP, his personal memecoin launched in January. Early buyers flipped profits fast. But anyone who joined after the first 24 hours got wiped out. By the day Trump was sworn in again, it had fallen 90%. That’s still better than $Melania, which did even worse. The only thing that half-worked was the NFT drop. Trump sold $99 digital trading cards of himself posing as everything from a superhero to a space commander. Those NFTs hit a floor price of almost $800 at one point. Today, the cheapest one goes for around $200. But over the last week, individual sales have bounced between $82 and $846. Like always, late buyers lost the most. Now comes a new pitch: a “crypto treasury” company modeled after what Michael Saylor pulled off with MicroStrategy, now renamed Strategy. Saylor’s model is simple: use company cash, debt, and equity to buy bitcoin nonstop. It now holds more than 3% of all bitcoin in circulation, worth $70 billion. Trump’s family saw the hype and copied the structure, but swapped out bitcoin for a token called WLFI. The coin comes from World Liberty Financial, a company co-founded by Trump and his sons. As part of the fundraising, World Liberty took a stake in crypto firm Alt5 Sigma. The campaign is trying to raise $1.5 billion to buy WLFI tokens. Eric Trump, Trump’s son, now sits on Alt5’s board. WLFI is scheduled to go live in September. But it doesn’t offer ownership, profits, or anything concrete. It gives holders just 5% of the vote in the governance of USD1, a dollar-backed stablecoin controlled by World Liberty. That’s it. Bitcoin has a cap. WLFI doesn’t. It has no track record. The only value? Buying it is a public show of loyalty to Trump. Unless the holdings are massive enough to trigger disclosures, no one would even know you hold any. Meanwhile, Trump holds a mountain of WLFI. And a company tied to him is entitled to take 75% of any WLFI sold by World Liberty. That’s where the money is. Not in the token. In the setup. The profits don’t go to the public. They go straight back to Trump. Owen Lamont, a portfolio manager at Acadian Asset Management, said , “This phenomenon violates every principle of finance. Before, people had to do complicated things to bamboozle investors. Now they can just do the simple thing.” And there’s history to back him up. Stocks that trade way above their actual asset value never hold up. The Taiwan Fund, launched in 1986, once had a premium of 300%. Today, it trades below the value of its holdings. Destiny Tech100, which has private equity stakes in SpaceX and OpenAI, soared to 20 times its asset value before falling back. It still trades at a premium, but far from the peak. So when Trump promises infinite upside, remember the cycle: he cashes in first, and everyone else gets left behind. There is no such thing as a perpetual money machine. Not even in crypto. title: Hacker Moves Loot: Over 38,000 Solana Purchased With Stolen Crypto
body: A hacker linked to the Coinbase breach has made another move, this time buying over 38,000 Solana tokens worth nearly $8 million. Blockchain tracking firm Ember CN reported that the hacker converted 7.957 million DAI to USDC before bridging the funds to Solana and purchasing the tokens at an average price of $208. Blueprint Of Bold Moves This is not the first major transaction tied to the hacker. Back in May, they offloaded 26,347 Ethereum for 68 million DAI at $2,588 per token. Two months later in July, they shifted gears and bought back 5,513 ETH for 14.865 million DAI, paying an average of $2,696 each. These calculated trades suggest the individual or group behind the breach is taking a measured approach rather than making random decisions. [从 Coinbase 用户处窃取资金的黑客] 在过去 1 小时里，把 795.7 万 DAI 换成 USDC 后跨链到 Solana，然后买成了 38,126 枚 SOL，购买价格 $208.7。 https://t.co/TRVVPiWIGS 这个黑客：1⃣5 月，出售 26,347 枚 ETH 换成 6818 万 DAI，出售均价 $2,588。2⃣7 月，1486.5 万 DAI 重新购买 5,513 枚… https://t.co/4HBWNBF738 pic.twitter.com/GIPGqwUJYu — 余烬 (@EmberCN) August 24, 2025 Market conditions may have influenced this latest decision. Solana has gained more than 17% over the past 30 days, even though it remains down about 25% from its all-time high of $295 in January. Analysts believe the token could see more upside if current momentum holds. Technical Outlook Signals Room For Gains Trader Ucan has identified a rising channel in Solana’s price structure following a rounded bottom formation. Key resistance levels include $215 for the first barrier, $227 for a breakout signal, and $242 as an upper target. The channel’s top sits near $251. Another market voice, trader Ali, suggested holding Solana until it approaches $360, a level some expect if bullish sentiment stays strong. The hacker’s purchase price of $208 aligns with those optimistic calls. Whether the market rewards that bet remains to be seen, but the move places the hacker among investors banking on Solana’s rally continuing. Fallout From The Coinbase Breach The initial breach, which took place in May, impacted about 70,000 Coinbase users. The reports indicated that the hackers paid foreign customer-support contractors a bribe to gain access to sensitive user information between December 2024 and May 2025. Sensitive user information exposed consisted of full names, birth dates, addresses, phone numbers, masked bank account data, and scans of government identification. Coinbase made the hack public after being presented with a $20 million ransom payment, which Coinbase declined to make. CEO Brian Armstrong later confirmed the exchange would reimburse affected customers and announced a $20 million bounty for information leading to an arrest. The company estimates remediation costs could reach $400 million as it works to tighten security and restore user confidence. For now, attention remains on the hacker’s latest bet. Whether the Solana purchase proves profitable—or marks the beginning of more high-profile trades—will depend on what happens in the coming weeks as the market reacts to shifting sentiment. Featured image from Pixabay, chart from TradingView
